name: The Great War: 1914-1918 (Canceled)
blurb: The Great War is a strategic WWI computer game which is based on the core values of classic board games. Keep it simple but strategic!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Thank you for your pledge! We are glad that you belief in our game and that you helped to make our dream come true.
The Start - Get a digital copy of \u201cThe Great War: 1914-1918\u201d. You will most likely receive your copy at the start of the war: but 100 years later.

The Sound of War \u2013 Get a digital copy and the digital soundtrack of the game. Get a heroic and powerful piece of music that makes every general invincible. (Notice: the General just feels invincible. Good music makes your troops not really bullet proof.)
The Art of War \u2013 Get a digital copy and a set of unique wallpapers of the game. The wallpapers are made by our game artists and show units, historical events and gameplay scenes.
War Bond I \u2013 Get a complete digital bundle at a very good price: Get a free copy, the soundtrack and the wallpapers.
Silent War Bond \u2013 You only care about the game. Get a digital download of the game. With this pledge you maximize your support for this project.
Fight a friend \u2013 Get 2 digital copies of the game and we will thank you for your support of the troops on the roll call on our website.
The Mouse War, Entente  \u2013 Get a digital copy of the game and one DVD of the game and a mouse pad with a design of the Entente.
The Mouse War, Central Powers  \u2013 Get a digital copy of the game and one DVD of the game and a mouse pad with a design of the Central Powers.
Man of Steel / Europe \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. The Cover shows a general European design.
Man of Steel / Entente \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. The Cover shows a Entente design.
Man of Steel / Central Powers \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. The Cover shows a Central Powers design.
Silent War Bond \u2013 You only care about the game. Get a digital download of the game. With this pledge you maximize your support for this project.

You become decorated / Italy \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also become decorated with a first class medal of that time (replica) from Italy.

You become decorated / Austria-Hungary\u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also become decorated with a first class medal of that time (replica) from Austria-Hungary.

You become decorated / Germany\u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also become decorated with a first class medal of that time (replica) from Germany.

You become really decorated / Germany\u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also become decorated with the highest medal of that time (replica) from Germany. The \u201cPour le M\u00e9rite\u201d, known informally as the Blue Max (German: Blauer Max).

You become really decorated / British Empire \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also become decorated with the highest medal of that time (replica) from the British Empire. The Victoria Cross is the highest military decoration awarded for valour "in the face of the enemy" to members of the armed forces.

News from the past \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get an original newspaper from 1914-1918 (different languages).

The powder keg release \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. We also thank you for your support of our troops at the in game credits.
Silent War Bond \u2013 You only care about the game. Get a digital download of the game. With this pledge you maximize your support for this project.

The Spy Who Loved Me / British Empire \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also a British spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / Russia \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also a Russian spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / France \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also a French spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / Italy \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also an Italian spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / Germany \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also a German spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / Austria-Hungary \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also an Austrian-Hungarian spy at the game will be named after you.

The Spy Who Loved Me / Ottoman Empire \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also an Ottoman spy at the game will be named after you.

A Quest to history \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You also get beta access to the game before the actual game is delivered. Also a quest at the game  will contain your name.
Silent War Bond \u2013 You only care about the game. Get a digital download of the game. With this pledge you maximize your support for this project.

Storyteller \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You can also get involved in the story of our game by making the idea of a quest. You can send us old documents, letters, photos or pictures of World War I that belong to your family, relatives or friends. Tell us, how you would like to see these documents implemented into a quest and how the quest could enhance the gameplay.

Wartime profiteer \u2013 Get a high-quality steel box copy of Great War: containing the game on DVD and a printed game manual. You will also get a chance to meet with us in London for an exclusive workshop where we present the current status of the game and show you our ideas and concepts for the game. Aditionally you can share with us your wishes and proposals and we will discuss their feasibility at the meeting.
